body.p:
HEAD-QUARTERS DISTRICT OF KENTUCKY,
Office of Chief of U. S. Police,
Lexington, July 25th 1864.
Capt Elisha Heady = U S Police office --

Will proceed under the direction of Capt A N Hale -- with the squad of men under Liut E J Vantyle 12th Regt Ohio Vols to Scour the county through which he may go -- and arrest all Guerrillas -- and seize all Arms & ammunition belonging to Disloyal men and all Govt property or Abandoned or Captured mules or Horses -- or any other property belonging to Govt and bring them to this office
he will report to this office as often as necessary -- his acts and doing he will see that his men do no wrong to union citizesn -- &C.

B F Lumpton A. D. C &
Cheif Police Dist of Kentucky
